testimonial.title: “No more battles with our character sheets!”
testimonial.intro: Many players present claimed it: physical coins change everything.
testimonial.story: Gone are the columns of numbers hastily scribbled on a crumpled sheet. From now on, each player felt the real weight of the loot, slipping between their fingers like a forgotten heirloom. A treasure become tangible. With every exchange, the whole body reacted: the hesitant hand, the weighing eye, the dry throat. The treasure took shape. It became dramatic stake, visceral emotion, an event, a memorable souvenir...
testimonial.emphasis: No more fighting with character sheets
testimonial.outro: the endless book searches while others tune out, or the long 0 / 0.1 / 0.2 / 0.3... character creation sessions that discourage before the game even starts. With Geek & Dragon, everything begins when the coin hits the table.
